Question: Sangean America Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sangean America Inc.

Product: 50th-anniversary special edition radios (WR-55, WR-101, WR-7X)

- Special edition radios to commemorate SANGEAN's 50th anniversary
- Models include WR-55 (US), WR-101 (Europe), and WR-7X (Taiwan)
- Represents a tribute to the brand's heritage and commitment to top-tier audio experiences
